adrFormatAddress: 343 W 58th St, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: I've seen Dr. Novella over the years for various problems.   I'm VERY picky about my doctors and he's just wonderful!  He's very experienced:  from professional athletes to professional dancers & ordinary folks, like me.  He's brilliant, honest, down-to-earth, patient, kind & warm.  He explains everything very clearly - what foot problem is, treatment options, etc.  You won't find a better podiatrist in the NYC area.

text.text: I've seen Dr. Novella over the years for various problems.   I'm VERY picky about my doctors and he's just wonderful!  He's very experienced:  from professional athletes to professional dancers & ordinary folks, like me.  He's brilliant, honest, down-to-earth, patient, kind & warm.  He explains everything very clearly - what foot problem is, treatment options, etc.  You won't find a better podiatrist in the NYC area.

originalText.text: I'm a big fan of Dr. Novella.  He's a podiatrist who does not do surgery, so he's a wonderful resource for an unbiased opinion.  He recommended that I avoid surgery (other drs - who were also surgeons recommended I get surgery), fast forward 6 years and my foot feels much better and I'm incredibly grateful that I avoided surgery.  He's not anti-surgery, just unbiased / unvested.  He's very straightforward, and has been working in this field for decades.  I highly recommend him.

originalText.text: As a former professional ballet/Broadway dancer I have very bad foot problems.  A friend who was also a professional dancer suggested I call this Dr.  For a Dr. who supposedly takes care of dancers I was surprised when they said they take no insurance.  I assume that means cash only!  Outrageous.  This is no doctor, this is a money hungry blood sucking thief!  Disgusting, should be ashamed!

originalText.text: He is the top professional in his field. His work with me has restored my ability to walk! I have been seeing him for 25+ years. Thank you Dr. Novella.

text.text: He is the top professional in his field. His work with me has restored my ability to walk! I have been seeing him for 25+ years. Thank you Dr. Novella.

originalText.text: Dr. Novella takes a very no nonsense holistic evidence-based approach. Highly recommend for simple as well as complex matters involving the foot/ankle.
